OrderChangeLog.name: OrderChangeLog
OrderChangeLog.description: Represents a log record of all change requests made to an order post activation. A log record is always one-to-one to change an order request.

ChangeLineId.description: The ID of the main change line created as a result of the change request. For example, if you change an order item, the ChangeLineId would be the change OrderItem ID, or if you change a shipping address, the ChangeLineId would be the change OrderDeliveryGroup ID.

ChangeLineType.description: The method used to implement the change.

ChangeOrderId.description: The ID of the change order.

ChangeRequest.description: The unique ID of the request of which this change is a part.

ChangeSummary.description: A human-readable summary of the change details.

ChangeType.description: The type of the change request.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: The ISO code for any currency allowed by the organization.

Name.description: The name for the order change log.

RelatedLineId.description: The ID of the main line that is changed as a result of this change.

RelatedOrderId.description: The ID of the order that is changed.

Status.description: The order status of the change order.
